SEARCH
Package task

Class Tree<T>

java.lang.Object
task.Tree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The data type held in the tree nodes.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Tree<T>>
public class Tree<T> extends Object implements Iterable<Tree<T>>
The `Tree` class represents a node in a tree data structure. Each node can hold data of any type T and have a parent (except the root node). Nodes can have children, which are also nodes.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Tree.TraversalMethod
    Enumeration for the tree traversal method (DFS - depth-first search, BFS - breadth-first search).

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Removes the current node from the tree while preserving its child nodes. If the current node is the root, it only removes its child nodes.
